message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling this product to you. I believe it holds significant value for your business. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,600,000. I'm open to hearing your thoughts and finding a mutually beneficial agreement.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in your product. While I appreciate its value, I am only able to offer $1,500,000 for it. I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I'm willing to come down slightly, but $1,500,000 is still below what I'm looking for. Would you consider $1,550,000?  I believe this price point reflects the true value of the product while acknowledging your interest.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,525,000. This brings us closer together and allows me to move forward with confidence.
